runs.comm: good length on off stump, tight start from Mathews, the batsman defends on the front foot towards point
Mathews swings the full ball into Akmal who meets it on the front foot with a drive
what a shot that is, Akmal leans into the cover drive and pierces the infield splendidly, super shot, full of confidence, Pakistan are away
straighter line from Mathews and Akmal flicks through midwicket, he hasn't timed this as well though
full ball outside off with a hint of shape away from the right-hander, Akmal drives to cover
Akmal ends the over by lifting the length ball over square leg, the fielder at deep backward square, Silva, sprints to his left and saves two runs by diving, super effort
ouch, he starts with a wide one down leg side, Shazaib lets it go
short of a length ball tucks Shazaib up, he fends off the back foot on the leg side
tight line and length on leg and middle stump, Shahzaib stays in his crease and blocks
width offered outside off and Shahzaib gets going with a dab down to third man, over to Akmal
short of a length on leg, Akmal turns the ball off his pads behind square
slower ball outside off stump, Shahzaib waits for it and opens the face of his bat to play the ball towards point
Udana completes an excellent first over by bowling a slower delivery around off stump, Shahzaib defends on the front foot
length delivery and the line is dead straight, Akmal gets behind the line and defends on the back foot
Akmal moves across and tries to work the ball off his hips but gets beaten and hit on the thigh pad
Akmal tries to force the ball through cover with a back foot drive but mis-times it
full length this time and Akmal drives to mid-off and sprints the single
the short ball from Malinga rears up at Shahzaib, that was 90mph, the batsman tried to play on the front foot and was in all sorts of trouble, the ball rapped him on the gloves and went towards point
Malinga ends the over with a clever slower ball, Shahzaib, unlike several before him, is good enough to adjust and guard his stumps
Akmal flicks a full ball off his pads through square leg
Akmal gets a long way across his stumps and tries to paddle the ball past fine leg, he doesn't make proper contact

Shahzaib gets under the ball and lofts it high over the offside, he hasn't timed it well, Mathews chases it from cover, running backwards, looking up all the time, he dives full length but can't reach it, terrific effort
yorker! Shahzaib brings his bat down in time and gets an edge down to the fine leg boundary, there's no fielder there
Shahzaib goes hard at the ball again and smacks it through square leg

full ball, Akmal sees it early, winds up and lofts the ball high in the air over mid-on, the ball stays airborne for ages before pitching and rolling towards the boundary, Malinga sprints after and slides valiantly, he gets a hand to it but can't prevent it from touching the rope
defended on the front foot towards the leg side
shouts of "catch, catch" as Shahzaib chips the ball in the air but it falls short of mid-on
played off the back foot towards point
Akmal charges Murali, trying to hit him down the ground, he gets beaten in the flight and edges the ball over cover, lucky break for Akmal, that could have gone absolutely anywhere
quicker ball on off stump, cut off the back foot
Akmal tries to muscle Murali down the ground but mis-times it towards mid-off, quick single taken
Akmal stays back and makes room to play on the off side, he has to defend Mendis' quick and straight ball in a hurry
quick and straight again, Akmal gets a leading edge towards point
whack! Akmal gets down on one knee, the length is a little shorter and Akmal clobbers the ball into the stands at midwicket, hit flat and with tremendous power
Akmal gets down on one knee again and paddles the ball around the corner, a powerful shot followed by a deft one
Mendis skids the ball through outside off stump, Akmal gets beaten on the cut
Akmal tries the sweep past short fine leg again but doesn't connect well this time
Akmal throws his bat at one outside off and slices it down to third man
short of a length outside off stump, Shahzaib tries to run the ball own to third man but misses
short and wide outside off stump, Shahzaib reaches out and taps the ball past backward point for a single
that's some strike! Akmal moves across, gets into position early by going down on one knee, and pulls the ball from outside off stump into the fans at square leg, stupendous hit
played through point for a single
short of a length outside off stump, Shahzaib tries the run the ball down to third man but can't make contact

and he strikes first ball! Akmal charges him straightaway and tries to hit down the ground, Jayasuriya follows him with a full ball, cramping the batsman for room, Akmal swings and misses, he's so far out of his ground that he barely tries to get back before Sangakkara whips off the bails
he gets off the mark by nudging the ball around the corner
Shahzaib tries to work the ball on the leg side but doesn't connect cleanly
swept off his pads behind square for a single
bowled slowly through the air on middle stump, Shahzaib defends on the front foot
pushed off the front foot towards the bowler, terrific over from Jayasuriya, three runs and a wicket
punched off the back foot towards long off for a single

Mendis beats the bat with the carrom ball, Sangakkara whips off the bails in a flash! Did Shahzaib lift his back foot? I think he did, ever so marginally, but it's too close to call, that can't be given, and the third umpire gives the batsmen the benefit
Shahzaib clears his front foot out of the way and biffs Mendis down the ground, the fielder at long-on can't dive in time to stop the four
right Shahzaib has decided to take on Mendis, he clears his front foot out of the way and blasts the ball flat over extra cover, he's picked the gap in the outfield perfectly
and now he moves across and paddles the ball behind square for a single
nudged off the back foot through midwicket, Afridi's hit it gently enough for the batsmen to run two before the fielder in the deep gets to the ball
Shahzaib's gone! He tried to attack Murali too, aiming for the slog sweep, the ball hit the top edge and went straight up in the air before falling into Jayasuriya's hands at short fine leg
driven back to the bowler on the front foot
Afridi tries to sweep but the ball hits his body and goes to short fine leg, Afridi wants the single but gets sent back, there's a direct hit from the fielder but Afridi is safe
played off the pads towards square leg for one
full ball drifted across the right-hander, Malik drives to long on
Afridi appears bent on sweeping Murali but gets beaten by the fast ball that speeds across his off stump
length ball on the pads, forced through midwicket for just the single
Malinga fires in the yorker which Afridi digs out on the leg side for a single, Malinga tries valiantly to stop it by diving to his right but he can't
short of a length outside off stump, Malik waits in his crease for it and dabs the ball down to third man for one
Malinga bounces Afridi and the batsman lets it go over his helmet
that's a sharp short ball, Afridi let the previous one go easily but he had to hurry out of this one to avoid getting hit in the face
fuller ball and Afridi plays it towards long-on for a single, they think about the second by Malik declines
pulled down to long-on for a single
Malik uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball and whips it through midwicket
Afridi drives towards long on for one more
Malik steps out again, Jayasuriya follows him and drives towards long on for another single
Afridi makes room by moving towards leg, Jayasuriya cramps him for space, Afridi drives down the ground
Afridi sweeps towards deep backward square, six singles off the over
good length ball around off stump, dabbed towards third man for one

the slower ball outside off stump, Afridi doesn't read it well but somehow manages to chip it in the air towards mid-on, there's no fielder there so they run a second before Udana gets to the ball himself
drilled down the ground for one, but Malik wants more and he is tearing back for the second, phenomenal running
full toss on leg stump, flicked off the pads towards square leg
full and wide outside off stump, Malik was out of his crease and had to reach out to hit it through cover
Afridi gets down on one knee and taps the ball wide of the fielder at short fine leg
he's smashed that! Afridi picks up the ball from outside off and hammers it over the midwicket boundary ... Dil dil Pakistan indeed!
Afridi charges Murali, makes room, and blazes the ball flat over extra cover, one bounce four, massive two balls for Pakistan, Afridi!!!!
nudged off the pads towards square leg
Malik comes forward and chips the ball into the gap at midwicket to take two
pushed off the front foot towards cover
it's the wrong one and Malik gets an outside edge towards the off side, he was trying to play towards leg
... and he beats the bat right away, Malik tries to cut but the ball skids past
this time he makes contact and cuts the ball towards deep point
Afridi makes room and blasts the ball towards deep cover, just the single though
Malik plays the ball to short fine leg and Afridi is off for the single in a massive hurry, he dives full length to beat Jayasuriya's throw, Pakistan reach 100
nudged on the leg side for one, a bit of hesitation but they make it comfortably
pulled through midwicket for two more
a fast swinging full toss, Afridi stands his ground and flicks towards square leg
the slower ball outside off stump, Malik tries to play the late cut but can't
Malik chops a yorker into the pitch hard and they run a single
Afridi makes room to hit on the off side by moving outside leg, Malinga responds by firing a full toss wide outside off stump, Afridi can't reach it even though he lunges
fantastic yorker, Afridi stays in his crease and plays it back to the bowler
flicked of the pads towards midwicket, there's a bit of a mix-up between the batsmen but the fielder fumbles! Pressure!
full ball on the pads, Mendis follows Afridi as he makes room, flicked through midwicket for one
Malik jumps down the track and chips towards long off for a single
Mendis fires in the yorker and Afridi digs it out towards t he bowler for a single
Malik gets out of his crease again and hits the ball to long on for one
full toss and Afridi heaves it into the gap at deep midwicket! Has he got four? No he hasn't, two runs though ...
Afridi makes room but mis-times the drive to cover, the 50 stand is up between these two.
yorker, and Afridi swings hard to muscle the ball through the leg side, he returns for the second
full ball outside off stump, Afridi slogs and hits it towards deep square leg, only the single, we haven't seen a boundary in a while
that's too wide outside off stump, Harper takes his time but eventually signals it
full and straight, Malik drives the ball hard into the pitch and the ball bounces over the bowler's head, they settle for the single
excellent ball, in the blockhole, Afridi squeezes it down the ground and Malik is running frantically for the second, Afridi struggles to make it back for the second run
is that the game breaker? Afridi winds up and unleashes the most monstrous of hits, he's whacked the slower ball way back into the stands at midwicket, Lord's goes berserk ...

high full toss ... it's a no ball for being over waist height, Afridi whips it off his body past short fine leg, four! Afridi reaches his fifty! What a player! What an innings ... He's won it for Pakistan today
Afridi digs the yorker down the ground for a single
full ball on off and middle stump, Afridi flicks through midwicket, sensible sensible innings, barely a risk taken
four! four! Malik nudges the ball off his pads past the man at short fine leg, no stopping that, Pakistan are two runs away, Malinga lost control of that slower one
yorker, single, Malik digs it out towards short fine leg,

he's done it! Afridi misses the yorker and it hits him on the pad and the ball goes on the off side, it's a leg bye but who cares, Afridi raises his arms in triumph, what a player, he's delivered when it mattered most, the players rush on to the ground to mob him and Malik, such joy, there are hugs all around
